# true-container

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                | Type                                                 | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | -------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `align`     | `align`      | Grid item alignment        | `"stretch"`                                          | `undefined` |
| `columnGap` | `column-gap` | Gap bewteen grid columns   | `string`                                             | `undefined` |
| `columns`   | `columns`    | Grid comlumn template      | `string`                                             | `undefined` |
| `justify`   | `justify`    | Grid content justification | `string`                                             | `'initial'` |
| `maxWidth`  | `max-width`  | Maximum width of container | `"content" \| "detail" \| "form" \| "max" \| "none"` | `'content'` |
